title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 19 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 19 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Senator Bill Hagerty (R-TN) joins Clay and Buck to discuss Biden’s covid press conference yesterday, the administration's failed response in Afghanistan, and the new measures the administration will be taking on mask mandates. Biden pushes private sector to enforce vaccine mandates. Iceland is most vaccinated and still a surge of covid. Biden plummets in polls. Clay preps for a celebrity poker tournament.


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
